pr_title: [RW-4606][risk=no] Enable Concept flag for Physical Measurements in preprod

timeline.message: RW-4606 enable flag for PM in test, staging, stable and preprod

PM Concept Set retrive concept infromation from Concept table

RW-4606 make domain physical measurements for PM concept sets
